channel.title: Adding Shops[Help]
channel.description: I need someone to help me via Teamviewer with adding shops to my server. I always get errors. Just PM Me.

item.title: Adding Shops[Help]
item.dc:creator: @Lorenzo_Vq Lorenzo Vq
item.description:
@Lorenzo_Vq wrote:

dont worry… with my help, you wont need teamviewer i’ll give you a kinda tutorial for your need

first off, go into your client java, and search for this code.

WanneShop = 2;

just copy the whole code, and put it under, filling in the blanks… or use this one:

} else if (NPCID == 553) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2;
You can also change the 553, to another NPC id that you would prefer.
(Close and save the changes.)

Next, you should have a folder labeled Config, open it up, and find something called Shops.cfg.

Now put in this code.

shop = 2	Aubury's_Rune_Store				2	2	554	10000	555	10000	556	10000	557	10000	559	10000	558	10000	562	10000	560	10000	553	10000	565	10000

let me explain this.

the part that says shop = 2 is the wanneshop = 2 basically, change it to another number if u want. whatever number you used in the client.java, you would have to use in shops.cfg. the rest are the item id’s and the amount.

Save the settings, and compile.

hope this helped a bit, sorry if you got confused, another reference which i used are listed below.

http://www.youtube.com/
http://www.google.ca/

Read full topic
